"A Song of Ice and Snow": "/voice11_voice_navi004_trial_0001_012 Picking up the signal of a powerful enemy! The weather around it seems to be quite unstable, so please be careful."
"/voice11_voice_navi004_trial_0001_069 Enemy neutralization confirmed! Thank you very much."
"/voice11_voice_navi004_trial_0001_074 Oh dear... The enemy has withdrawn. To make up for it, let's focus on a different objective instead."
"/voice11_voice_navi004_trial_0001_019 There are Blast Charge Signs floating around the wind columns. Collect them to turn the tides of battle in your favor!"
